TITLE_UR: وہ تو خوشبو ہے ہواؤں میں بکھر جائے گا
TITLE_EN: He is like fragrance, he will scatter in the winds
CONTENT_UR:
وہ تو خوشبو ہے ہواؤں میں بکھر جائے گا
مسئلہ پھول کا ہے پھول کدھر جائے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
He is like fragrance, he will scatter in the winds
The problem is of the flower, where shall the flower go?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اک ہنر تھا کمال تھا کیا تھا
TITLE_EN: It was a skill, it was perfection, what was it?
CONTENT_UR:
اک ہنر تھا کمال تھا کیا تھا
وہ مجھے بھولتا نہیں ہوگا
TRANSLATION_EN:
It was a skill, it was perfection, what was it?
He will not forget me, perhaps
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تماشا اپنی تنہائی کا دیکھا
TITLE_EN: I witnessed the spectacle of my loneliness
CONTENT_UR:
تماشا اپنی تنہائی کا دیکھا
تو پھر اک رشتہ ٹوٹے کا نہ ٹوٹا
TRANSLATION_EN:
I witnessed the spectacle of my loneliness
Then, a bond that was to break, did not break
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: میں سچ کہوں گی مگر پھر بھی ہار جاؤں گی
TITLE_EN: I will speak the truth, but still I will lose
CONTENT_UR:
میں سچ کہوں گی مگر پھر بھی ہار جاؤں گی
وہ جھوٹ بولے گا اور لاجواب کر دے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
I will speak the truth, but still I will lose
He will lie and leave me speechless
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: دل کو تیری یاد پہ ہی چھوڑ آئے
TITLE_EN: I left my heart upon your memory
CONTENT_UR:
دل کو تیری یاد پہ ہی چھوڑ آئے
اور آنکھوں کو تجھ سے جوڑ آئے
TRANSLATION_EN:
I left my heart upon your memory
And connected my eyes to you
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اکسِ خوشبو ہوں بکھرنے سے نہ روکے کوئی
TITLE_EN: I am a reflection of fragrance, let no one stop me from scattering
CONTENT_UR:
اکسِ خوشبو ہوں بکھرنے سے نہ روکے کوئی
اور بکھر جاؤں تو مجھ کو نہ سمیٹے کوئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
I am a reflection of fragrance, let no one stop me from scattering
And if I scatter, let no one gather me
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: چلنے کا حوصلہ نہیں رکنا محال کر دیا
TITLE_EN: No courage to walk, made stopping impossible
CONTENT_UR:
چلنے کا حوصلہ نہیں رکنا محال کر دیا
عشق کے اس سفر نے تو مجھ کو نڈھال کر دیا
TRANSLATION_EN:
No courage to walk, made stopping impossible
This journey of love has exhausted me
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کچھ تو ہوا بھی سرد تھی کچھ تھا ترا خیال بھی
TITLE_EN: The wind was somewhat cold, and your thought was also there
CONTENT_UR:
کچھ تو ہوا بھی سرد تھی کچھ تھا ترا خیال بھی
دل کو خوشی کے ساتھ ساتھ ہوتا رہا ملال بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
The wind was somewhat cold, and your thought was also there
Along with happiness, there remained sorrow in the heart
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کوبکو پھیل گئی بات شناسائی کی
TITLE_EN: From street to street spread the matter of acquaintance
CONTENT_UR:
کوبکو پھیل گئی بات شناسائی کی
اس نے خوشبو کی طرح میری پذیرائی کی
TRANSLATION_EN:
From street to street spread the matter of acquaintance
He welcomed me like fragrance
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ ہواؤں کی طرح خانہ بدوش پھرتا ہے
TITLE_EN: He wanders like the winds, a nomad
CONTENT_UR:
وہ ہواؤں کی طرح خانہ بدوش پھرتا ہے
ایک جھونکا ہے جو آئے گا گزر جائے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
He wanders like the winds, a nomad
He is a breeze that will come and pass
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: زندگی یاد رکھے گی تجھے
TITLE_EN: Life will remember you
CONTENT_UR:
زندگی یاد رکھے گی تجھے
تو جو دریا تھا کنارے مل کر
TRANSLATION_EN:
Life will remember you
You who were a river, meeting the shore
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: مجھ سے پہلی سی محبت مری محبوب نہ مانگ
TITLE_EN: Do not ask me for love like before, my beloved
CONTENT_UR:
مجھ سے پہلی سی محبت مری محبوب نہ مانگ
میں نے سمجھا تھا کہ تو ہے تو دریا ورنا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Do not ask me for love like before, my beloved
I had thought you were a river, otherwise
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: خوشبو کی طرح پھیلی ہے اس شخص کی محبت
TITLE_EN: That person's love has spread like fragrance
CONTENT_UR:
خوشبو کی طرح پھیلی ہے اس شخص کی محبت
ہر پھول میں رہتا ہے مگر پھول نہیں ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
That person's love has spread like fragrance
It resides in every flower, yet is not the flower
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: محبت مجھ سے بھی ہے تجھ سے بھی ہے
TITLE_EN: Love exists in me, exists in you too
CONTENT_UR:
محبت مجھ سے بھی ہے تجھ سے بھی ہے
محبت کا انداز اور ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Love exists in me, exists in you too
But the style of love is different
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس نے جلتی ہوئی پیشانی پہ جو ہاتھ رکھا
TITLE_EN: When he placed his hand on my burning forehead
CONTENT_UR:
اس نے جلتی ہوئی پیشانی پہ جو ہاتھ رکھا
روح تک آ گئی تاثیر مسیحائی کی
TRANSLATION_EN:
When he placed his hand on my burning forehead
The healing effect reached my soul
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: بات وہ آدھی رات کی رات وہ پورے چاند کی
TITLE_EN: That matter of midnight, that night of full moon
CONTENT_UR:
بات وہ آدھی رات کی رات وہ پورے چاند کی
چاند بھی عین چیت کا اس پہ ترا جمال بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
That matter of midnight, that night of full moon
The moon was exactly of spring, and upon it your beauty too
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تم آئے ہو تو یوں لگا جیسے
TITLE_EN: When you came, it felt as if
CONTENT_UR:
تم آئے ہو تو یوں لگا جیسے
دھوپ میں سائبان مل گیا
TRANSLATION_EN:
When you came, it felt as if
In the sunlight, I found shade
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: شہر کی رات میں تنہا ہوں تو کیا گھبراؤں
TITLE_EN: If I am alone in the city night, why should I panic?
CONTENT_UR:
شہر کی رات میں تنہا ہوں تو کیا گھبراؤں
لوگ ملتے ہیں مگر دل نہیں ملتا ورنا
TRANSLATION_EN:
If I am alone in the city night, why should I panic?
People meet, but hearts don't meet, otherwise
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تم بھی جھونکے کی طرح آؤ تو جاتے کیوں ہو
TITLE_EN: If you also come like a breeze, why do you go?
CONTENT_UR:
تم بھی جھونکے کی طرح آؤ تو جاتے کیوں ہو
دور تک دل کی دھڑکن نے پکارا تم کو
TRANSLATION_EN:
If you also come like a breeze, why do you go?
The heartbeat called you from afar
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: ہم ملے تھے کبھی تو یوں لگا
TITLE_EN: When we met that time, it felt
CONTENT_UR:
ہم ملے تھے کبھی تو یوں لگا
جیسے پھر سے بہار آ گئی ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
When we met that time, it felt
As if spring has come again
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: شکستہ پھول کی پتی سہی مگر پروین
TITLE_EN: It may be the petal of a broken flower, but Parveen
CONTENT_UR:
شکستہ پھول کی پتی سہی مگر پروین
یہ دل کسی سے کسی اور طرح ٹوٹا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
It may be the petal of a broken flower, but Parveen
This heart broke from someone in a different way
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: جس طرح میرے خواب ہو گئے ریزہ ریزہ
TITLE_EN: Just as my dreams shattered into pieces
CONTENT_UR:
جس طرح میرے خواب ہو گئے ریزہ ریزہ
اس طرح سے کبھی ٹوٹ کے بکھرے کوئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
Just as my dreams shattered into pieces
May someone break and scatter like this
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے آنے کا دھیان رہتا ہے
TITLE_EN: The thought of his arrival remains
CONTENT_UR:
اس کے آنے کا دھیان رہتا ہے
پھر بھی دنیا کا کام رہتا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
The thought of his arrival remains
Yet the work of the world also remains
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کوئی آہٹ کوئی آواز کوئی چاپ نہیں
TITLE_EN: No sound, no voice, no footsteps
CONTENT_UR:
کوئی آہٹ کوئی آواز کوئی چاپ نہیں
دل کی گلیاں بڑی سنسان ہیں آئے کوئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
No sound, no voice, no footsteps
The streets of the heart are very deserted, may someone come
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی سخن ترازیاں میرے لیے بھی ڈھال تھیں
TITLE_EN: His speech was also a shield for me
CONTENT_UR:
اس کی سخن ترازیاں میرے لیے بھی ڈھال تھیں
اس کی ہنسی میں چھپ گیا اپنے غموں کا حال بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
His speech was also a shield for me
In his laughter, the state of my sorrows also got hidden
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: حسن کے سمجھنے کو عمر چاہیے جاناں
TITLE_EN: To understand beauty, a lifetime is needed, my love
CONTENT_UR:
حسن کے سمجھنے کو عمر چاہیے جاناں
دو گھڑی کی چاہت میں لڑکیاں نہیں کھلتیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
To understand beauty, a lifetime is needed, my love
In a moment's desire, girls do not blossom
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: دھنک دھنک میری پوروں کو خواب کر دے گا
TITLE_EN: He will make my ankles dream-like
CONTENT_UR:
دھنک دھنک میری پوروں کو خواب کر دے گا
مرے وجود کو اک پھول کی طرح کر دے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
He will make my ankles dream-like
He will make my existence like a flower
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: خالی آنکھوں میں سپنا جھانکتا ہے
TITLE_EN: A dream peeks into empty eyes
CONTENT_UR:
خالی آنکھوں میں سپنا جھانکتا ہے
کہیں کا میں نہیں رہا کہیں کا
TRANSLATION_EN:
A dream peeks into empty eyes
I am no longer from somewhere, from somewhere
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ عکس موج گل تھا چمن چمن میں رہا
TITLE_EN: He was the reflection of the wave of flowers, remained in every garden
CONTENT_UR:
وہ عکس موج گل تھا چمن چمن میں رہا
میں اس کو ڈھونڈتی رہی وہ خود مرا رہا
TRANSLATION_EN:
He was the reflection of the wave of flowers, remained in every garden
I kept searching for him, he remained mine
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: بہت رویا وہ ہمکو یاد کر کے
TITLE_EN: He cried a lot remembering us
CONTENT_UR:
بہت رویا وہ ہمکو یاد کر کے
ہماری زندگی برباد کر کے
TRANSLATION_EN:
He cried a lot remembering us
After ruining our life
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اپنی رسوائی تیرے نام کا چرچا دیکھوں
TITLE_EN: I see the mention of my disgrace with your name
CONTENT_UR:
اپنی رسوائی تیرے نام کا چرچا دیکھوں
اپنی تنہائی مرے نام پہ آباد کرے
TRANSLATION_EN:
I see the mention of my disgrace with your name
May my loneliness flourish upon my name
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی قریب شاہ رگ کبھی بعید وہم و خواب
TITLE_EN: Sometimes near like the jugular vein, sometimes distant like illusion and dream
CONTENT_UR:
کبھی قریب شاہ رگ کبھی بعید وہم و خواب
اس کی رفاقتوں میں رات ہجر بھی تھا وصال بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes near like the jugular vein, sometimes distant like illusion and dream
In his company, the night had both separation and union
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کھلی آنکھوں میں سپنا جھانکتا ہے
TITLE_EN: A dream peeks into open eyes
CONTENT_UR:
کھلی آنکھوں میں سپنا جھانکتا ہے
کہیں کا میں نہیں رہا کہیں کا
TRANSLATION_EN:
A dream peeks into open eyes
I am no longer from somewhere, from somewhere
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کریا جان میں کوئی پھول کھلانے آئے
TITLE_EN: May someone come to bloom a flower in my being
CONTENT_UR:
کریا جان میں کوئی پھول کھلانے آئے
میرے دل کے زخموں کو مندمل کرنے آئے
TRANSLATION_EN:
May someone come to bloom a flower in my being
May someone come to heal the wounds of my heart
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ میرے ساتھ چلتا ہے چاند کی طرح
TITLE_EN: He walks with me like the moon
CONTENT_UR:
وہ میرے ساتھ چلتا ہے چاند کی طرح
کون کہتا ہے میں تنہا ہوں شب ہجراں میں
TRANSLATION_EN:
He walks with me like the moon
Who says I am alone in the night of separation
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: نیند تو خواب ہے اور ہجر کی شب خواب کہاں
TITLE_EN: Sleep is a dream, and in the night of separation, where is sleep?
CONTENT_UR:
نیند تو خواب ہے اور ہجر کی شب خواب کہاں
وصل کی رات بھی اک خواب تھا سو ٹوٹ گیا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sleep is a dream, and in the night of separation, where is sleep?
The night of union was also a dream, so it broke
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس شخص کی محبت کا چرچا نہیں مٹے گا
TITLE_EN: The mention of that person's love will not be erased
CONTENT_UR:
اس شخص کی محبت کا چرچا نہیں مٹے گا
ہر پھول میں رہے گا مگر پھول نہیں ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
The mention of that person's love will not be erased
He will remain in every flower, yet is not the flower
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: شام کی ناسمجھ ہوا پوچھ رہی ہے ایک پتہ
TITLE_EN: The foolish evening wind is asking for an address
CONTENT_UR:
شام کی ناسمجھ ہوا پوچھ رہی ہے ایک پتہ
موج ہوا کوئے یار کچھ تو میرا خیال بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
The foolish evening wind is asking for an address
O breeze of the beloved's street, think of me too sometimes
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: ہم تو سمجھے تھے کہ اک زخم ہے بھر جائے گا
TITLE_EN: We thought it was a wound that would heal
CONTENT_UR:
ہم تو سمجھے تھے کہ اک زخم ہے بھر جائے گا
کیا خبر تھی کہ رگ جاں میں اتر جائے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
We thought it was a wound that would heal
Who knew it would descend into the vein of life
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: میرا دل ہے آتشؔیں تجھ تک پہنچنے کے لیے
TITLE_EN: My heart is restless to reach you
CONTENT_UR:
میرا دل ہے آتشؔیں تجھ تک پہنچنے کے لیے
تن کو کشتی اور خون کو دریا کر دے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
My heart is restless to reach you
It will make the body a boat and blood a river
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اندھیروں کو چیرتا ہوا ایک چراغ
TITLE_EN: A lamp tearing through the darkness
CONTENT_UR:
اندھیروں کو چیرتا ہوا ایک چراغ
یوں تو بجھ گیا مگر روشنی رہ گئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
A lamp tearing through the darkness
It extinguished, but the light remained
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.
